CustomField.description: Field used to report for Marketing, Finance, and Sales net new Inbound 'Payroll' Opportunities. "Net New" is a non-payroll client and 'Payroll' is defined as a product that includes a payroll package.
CustomField.formula: IF( (Primary__c=true && TEXT(Referral_Partner__r.Referral_Product_Type__c) = 'Payroll') || (Primary__c=true && TEXT(Referral_Partner__r.Referral_Product_Type__c) = 'ASO' && Inbound_Integrated_Selling__c = false && Selling_Opportunity__r.Payroll_Client__c = false)|| (Primary__c=true && TEXT(Referral_Partner__r.Referral_Product_Type__c) = 'PEO' && Inbound_Integrated_Selling__c = false && Selling_Opportunity__r.Payroll_Client__c = false), true, false)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is true if the Inbound Opportunity is a Referral Product Type of Payroll, ASO, or PEO, a net new Account (not using Payroll Services), and a Primary Referral.
CustomField.label: Net New Payroll
